extendedInfo.description: Big catch Doner is a retro style game for your modern mobile phone!Ahab and Kebab, the well-known characters from a small cartoon sequence, are best friends and they like Doner Kebab, a turkish-german fast-food.Slip into Ahab's role and catch as many flying doner as you can.But watch out and don't let the ghost of Kebab gets you!Slide the controller button left and right to move your hero.Look out for more!Slip into Ahab's role and catch as many flying doner as you can. Slide the controller button left and right to move your hero (Level 2: additional jump button).
